dialogue.text: So I'm just going to explain each field and what it does.
First up, the profile name field.
Your profile name will appear on the saves menu when you launch the game. It'll also appear in the main menu, below the
Psych Engine version information. Additionally, I'll use your profile name when you visit me in the Options menu for the first time.
So please don't set it to anything...\nInappropriate. I'd rather not be vulgar!
Next up is the birthday field.
Set your birthday up and you can get a special achievement on your birthday if you open the game!
Admittedly, that's the only use it's got right now.
Ok, next is the save name field. This is used internally to keep track of your data and keep it separate from other saves on your
computer. The game uses 'default' as its default save, so don't try using that, ok?
Last but not least, the comment field. You can set this and have a funny message appear on the save selection screen.
Leave it blank and I'll just set a random one for you when you save.
Alright, I hope that explains everything. I'll leave you to it. Just press the H key if you need to hear this again!
